mapper.select: SELECT ff.id, ff.staff_phone_email, ff.staff_name, ff.staff_img, ct.dict_name as baseStaffStatus, role.role_name, ff.creation_time FROM barber_staff ff JOIN barber_dict ct ON ff.staff_status = ct.id JOIN barber_staff_role le on le.staff_id = ff.id JOIN barber_role role on le.role_id = role.id WHERE ff.staff_status != 7

SELECT ff.staff_img as staffImg, ff.staff_name, me.itme_name as roleName, me.itme_price, ct.dict_name as baseStaffStatus FROM barber_itme me JOIN barber_staff_role le ON me.role_id = le.role_id JOIN barber_staff ff ON ff.id = le.staff_id JOIN barber_dict ct ON ff.staff_status = ct.id
me.role_id = #{roleId} and me.id = #{itmeId}
